basic_info.title: ChatGPT
basic_info.description: ChatGPT is a chatbot that uses GPT-3 to generate responses to user input. The project showcases the developer's proficiency in React and JavaScript. The application includes features such as a chatbot that generates responses to user input, a search bar that allows users to search for specific responses, and a settings page that allows users to customize the chatbot's settings. ChatGPT demonstrates the developer's ability to use React and JavaScript to create a functional and user-friendly web application.
